section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ata from Anbasah bin Abi Sufyan, that Umm Habibah said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: 'Whoever prays twelve rak'ahs a day, Allah (SWT), the Mighty and Sublime, will build for him a house in Paradise
